description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任湖南省委书记、省长，拥有航天工业背景。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, formerly the Party Secretary and Governor of Hunan Province, with a background in the aerospace industry.

nodes.id: 中国共产党湖南省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党湖南省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在湖南省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Hunan Province.

description.zh-cn: 现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: Current General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任湖南省委书记，是许达哲多个职务的前任。
description.en: A Chinese political figure, former Party Secretary of Hunan Province, and predecessor to Xu Dazhe in several positions.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，接替许达哲担任中共湖南省委书记等职务。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who succeeded Xu Dazhe as Party Secretary of the CPC Hunan Provincial Committee and in other roles.

nodes.id: 湖南省人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 湖南省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 湖南省人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The standing body of the Hunan Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖南省的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative organ of Hunan Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，接替许达哲担任湖南省人民政府省长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who succeeded Xu Dazhe as Governor of the Hunan Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国江西省的省会，许达哲的出生地。
description.en: The capital of Jiangxi Province in the People's Republic of China, and the birthplace of Xu Dazhe.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国黑龙江省哈尔滨市的著名高等学府，许达哲的母校。
description.en: A renowned institution of higher learning located in Harbin, Heilongjiang Province, China, and Xu Dazhe's alma mater.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十七届中央纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十七届中央纪律检查委员会
中国共产党第十七届中纪委

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第十七次全国代表大会选举产生的中央纪律检查委员会。
description.en: The Central Commission for Discipline Inspection elected at the 17th National Congress of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十八届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十八届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第十八次全国代表大会选举产生的中央委员会。
description.en: The Central Committee elected at the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第十九次全国代表大会选举产生的中央委员会。
description.en: The Central Committee elected at the 19th National Congress of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国航天科工集团公司

zh-cn: 中国航天科工集团公司
en: China Aerospace Science and Industry Corporation

description.zh-cn: 中国大型国有企业，主要从事航天防务技术和装备的研发生产。
description.en: A large state-owned enterprise in China, primarily engaged in the research, development, and production of aerospace defense technology and equipment.

nodes.id: 中国航天科技集团公司

zh-cn: 中国航天科技集团公司
en: China Aerospace Science and Technology Corporation

description.zh-cn: 中国大型国有企业，主要从事运载火箭、卫星、载人飞船等宇航产品的研制。
description.en: A large state-owned enterprise in China, primarily engaged in the development of space products such as launch vehicles, satellites, and manned spacecraft.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部
en: Ministry of Industry and Information Technology of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管工业、通信业、软件服务业、网络安全等的组成部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for industry, communications, the software service industry, and cybersecurity.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国负责民用航天管理及国际空间合作的政府机构。
description.en: The government agency of the People's Republic of China responsible for civil space administration and international space cooperation.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国主管核工业的国务院部委管理的国家局。
description.en: A state administration under a ministry of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for the nuclear industry.

en: State Administration for Science, Technology and Industry for National Defense

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部管理的国家局，负责管理国防科技工业。
description.en: A state administration managed by the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology of the People's Republic of China, responsible for managing the national defense science, technology, and industry.

nodes.id: 中国运载火箭技术研究院

zh-cn: 中国运载火箭技术研究院
航天工业部第一研究院
en: China Academy of Launch Vehicle Technology

description.zh-cn: 中国历史最久、规模最大的导弹武器和运载火箭研究、设计和生产基地。
description.en: China's oldest and largest research, design, and production base for missile weapons and launch vehicles.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的载人航天计划。
description.en: The manned spaceflight program of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国首次载人航天飞行任务。
description.en: China's first human spaceflight mission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，许达哲多个职务的前任。
description.en: A Chinese political figure, predecessor to Xu Dazhe in several positions.

description.zh-cn: 中国杂交水稻育种专家，被誉为“世界杂交水稻之父”。
description.en: A Chinese agronomist known for developing the first hybrid rice varieties, hailed as the 'Father of Hybrid Rice'.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会教育科学文化卫生委员会

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会教育科学文化卫生委员会
全国人大教科文卫委员会
en: Education, Science, Culture and Public Health Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会的专门委员会之一。
description.en: One of the special committees of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，接替许达哲担任国家国防科技工业局局长等职务。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who succeeded Xu Dazhe as Director of the State Administration for Science, Technology and Industry for National Defense and in other roles.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，接替许达哲担任中国航天科技集团公司董事长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who succeeded Xu Dazhe as Chairman of the China Aerospace Science and Technology Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 中国航天领域人物，是许达哲在中国航天科工集团公司总经理职位上的前任。
description.en: A figure in China's aerospace sector, predecessor to Xu Dazhe as General Manager of the China Aerospace Science and Industry Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 中国航天领域人物，接替许达哲担任中国航天科工集团公司总经理。
description.en: A figure in China's aerospace sector who succeeded Xu Dazhe as General Manager of the China Aerospace Science and Industry Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 许达哲出生于江西省南昌市。
description.en: Xu Dazhe was born in Nanchang, Jiangxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 许达哲于1978年入学哈尔滨工业大学机械系机械制造专业，先后完成本科和硕士研究生学习。
description.en: Xu Dazhe enrolled in the Mechanical Manufacturing program of the Department of Mechanics at Harbin Institute of Technology in 1978, completing both his undergraduate and master's studies there.

description.zh-cn: 许达哲于1982年1月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Xu Dazhe joined the Communist Party of China in January 1982.

relationships.target: 中国运载火箭技术研究院

description.zh-cn: 许达哲自1984年研究生毕业后在此工作，历任设计员、组长、副所长等职，最终升任院长、党委副书记。
description.en: After graduating in 1984, Xu Dazhe worked here, holding positions such as designer, team leader, and deputy director, eventually rising to become President and Deputy Party Secretary.

relationships.target: 中国航天科技集团公司

description.zh-cn: 许达哲曾先后担任中国航天科技集团公司副总经理、党组成员（2001-2007）和董事长、党组书记（2013）。
description.en: Xu Dazhe served successively as Deputy General Manager and Party Leadership Group Member (2001-2007) and Chairman and Party Leadership Group Secretary (2013) of China Aerospace Science and Technology Corporation.

relationships.target: 中国航天科工集团公司

description.zh-cn: 许达哲于2007年至2013年担任中国航天科工集团公司总经理、党组书记。
description.en: Xu Dazhe served as General Manager and Party Secretary of China Aerospace Science and Industry Corporation from 2007 to 2013.

description.zh-cn: 许达哲参与了神舟系列飞船十次飞天的工作。
description.en: Xu Dazhe participated in the work of ten missions of the Shenzhou program.

description.zh-cn: 在神舟五号飞船发射时，许达哲亲任首次载人飞行试验大队的大队长。
description.en: During the launch of the Shenzhou 5 spacecraft, Xu Dazhe personally served as the commander of the first manned flight test team.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第十七届中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 许达哲是中国共产党第十七届中纪委委员。
description.en: Xu Dazhe was a member of the 17th Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the CPC.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第十八届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 许达哲在中共十八大上当选为第十八届中央委员。
description.en: Xu Dazhe was elected as a member of the 18th Central Committee at the 18th National Congress of the CPC.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 许达哲是第十九届中央委员。
description.en: Xu Dazhe was a member of the 19th Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 许达哲先后接替马兴瑞担任中国航天科技集团公司董事长和工业和信息化部副部长等职务。
description.en: Xu Dazhe successively succeeded Ma Xingrui as Chairman of China Aerospace Science and Technology Corporation and as Vice Minister of Industry and Information Technology, among other roles.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部
中国共产党湖南省委员会

position.en: Secretary of the CPC Hunan Provincial Committee

description.zh-cn: 作为地方党委负责人，许达哲向中共中央总书记习近平负责。
description.en: As the head of a provincial party committee, Xu Dazhe was subordinate to CPC General Secretary Xi Jinping.

relationships.target: 湖南省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 许达哲先后接替杜家毫出任湖南省省长、中共湖南省委书记和湖南省人大常委会主任。
description.en: Xu Dazhe successively succeeded Du Jiahao as Governor of Hunan, Secretary of the CPC Hunan Provincial Committee, and Director of the Hunan Provincial People's Congress Standing Committee.

description.zh-cn: 张庆伟先后接替许达哲担任中共湖南省委书记和湖南省人大常委会主任。
description.en: Zhang Qingwei successively succeeded Xu Dazhe as Secretary of the CPC Hunan Provincial Committee and Director of the Hunan Provincial People's Congress Standing Committee.

description.zh-cn: 毛伟明接替许达哲担任湖南省人民政府省长。
description.en: Mao Weiming succeeded Xu Dazhe as Governor of the Hunan Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 习近平委托许达哲专程看望袁隆平的家属，转达悼念和问候。
description.en: Xi Jinping entrusted Xu Dazhe to make a special trip to visit Yuan Longping's family to convey condolences and greetings.

relationships.target: 全国人民代表大会教育科学文化卫生委员会

relationships.source: 湖南省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 湖南省人大常委会决定罢免许达哲的第十四届全国人民代表大会代表职务。
description.en: The Standing Committee of the Hunan Provincial People's Congress decided to recall Xu Dazhe from his post as a delegate to the 14th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 许达哲卸任工信部副部长等职务后，由唐登杰等人接任。
description.en: After Xu Dazhe left his posts including Vice Minister of MIIT, Tang Dengjie and others took over.

description.zh-cn: 雷凡培接替许达哲担任中国航天科技集团公司董事长。
description.en: Lei Fanpei succeeded Xu Dazhe as Chairman of China Aerospace Science and Technology Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 许达哲接替殷兴良担任中国航天科工集团公司总经理。
description.en: Xu Dazhe succeeded Yin Xingliang as General Manager of China Aerospace Science and Industry Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 高红卫接替许达哲担任中国航天科工集团公司总经理。
description.en: Gao Hongwei succeeded Xu Dazhe as General Manager of China Aerospace Science and Industry Corporation.
